description:
This is the PREMIUM version of the Outsourcing and Remote Teams - Getting Started course. Not only do you get the same great content, you also receive:

  1. Step-by-Step video based training in getting started
  2. A copy of 'How To Outsource Without Losing Your Mind'. - a 29 page getting started eBook, normally sold for $17.
  3. Video training on my preferred job site for finding virtual assistants. A 'How To' and tips and tricks for finding the right person.
  4. Setting up and configuring your online project management system and how to do it for FREE. A simple to follow video guide.
  5. A PDF file of sample job advertisements for the common job types and roles you will be recruiting for.
  6. A template Welcome Email that I use for induction that has never failed me!
  7. DropBox Video guide - how to set it up and run your team efficiently with it.


There are also 7 included AUDIO guides from the lessons I have learnt:

  1. Handling Exchange Rates
  2. Avoiding Prepayment
  3. Provide Opportunities
  4. Creating Tasks and Assigning
  5. Overcoming Differences within your Team
  6. Building Trust with Remote Team Members
  7. Managing the difference in Time Zones


This course is for anyone who can answer YES to any of the following questions:

  • Have you struggled to find a virtual assistant?
  • Desperately need to outsource some work?
  • Missing important skills needed to expand your business?
  • Have no idea how to get started?

If so, then you need to join this course.


You will discover how to:

  • Overcome the challenges of finding, hiring and inducting overseas employees
  • Create the team culture you need to work towards success
  • Avoid the challenges of communication problems
  • Create a relationship of trust between yourself and remote workers
  • The systems you need to use to get started and effective


Uncover all the secrets to establishing an effective remote team of outsourced workers with this 5 part video course by Adam Michael from Multiply-Yourself.

Included in this course are all the resources and guides you need to not only get started, but to succeed in managing your team.
title: Getting Started - Outsourcing & Remote Teams PREMIUM
